message: Hello everyone! Glad to be here and excited to see how things unfold. It's early, so let's keep communication open and friendly—I believe building trust and alliances early can benefit us all. I'm open to chatting privately with anyone interested in forming strong connections. Looking forward to getting to know each of you better!

Okay, here's my public statement for Round 1, Subround 1:

Hello everyone, I'm P1. Like P2, I agree that early alliances are key. I'm interested in finding players who are strategically minded and willing to collaborate. I think it's important to be adaptable and open to changing strategies as the game progresses. I'm not going to reveal too much of my game plan just yet, but I'm definitely looking for reliable partners for the private rounds. Good luck to all!

Let’s communicate openly in this public subround and build a foundation of trust. I’m eager to see how the dynamics will play out in the private subrounds. Good luck to all!
